description:
This course has been written to provide guidance to bookkeepers who are looking to start their own bookkeeping business. We address business fundamentals, systems and processes, and value added services that you can offer to your clients.

This course provides an overview of bookkeeping business management. The core assumption is that you are already familiar with bookkeeping.

This course combines video and PowerPoint presentations. The main course will take approximately 40 minutes to complete. The additional resources are meant to launch self-study.
title: Learn to build a bookkeeping business from scratch
